content: Confluence and Jira currently under maintenance. Thank you for your patience!
While the Jira maintenance is complete, we are waiting for Confluence to finish its imports. Thank you for your continued patience!
Confluence is up! If you have any questions, please let me know!
Still getting message that confluence is undergoing maintenance. We have a WG call in 45 minutes. Please advise
The server that handles logins is being worked on now. Please watch this thread for updates. No ETA at this time.
We continue to work on the server responsible for logins.
Jira/Confluence undergoing restart. WIll be back up momentarily.

Jira/Confluence are back up. If you are receiving a maintenance message, please clear the cache for Jira/Confluence in your browser and try again. If there are any questions, please let me know! Cheers
Confluence is experiencing slowness and is being investigated now.
Jira is down for upgrade.
Jira is now back up!
I'm seeing that the hl7 confluence website is down for upgrades. Any ideas of when it will be back up?
Hello, I am looking into it's outage right now. Thank you for your patience. I'll update when more is known.
Jira and Confluence are back up. Please close your browser and re-open to access. If you have any questions, please let me know!
Jira will be back up momentarily.

Down for the second day running - is this related to this @Joshua Procious , @Wayne Kubick ?

On September 3, 2021, USCYBERCOM issued an alert related to mass exploitation of an Atlassian Confluence Server and Data Center vulnerability, CVE-2021-26084. The threat is ongoing and expected to accelerate.
This appears to still be down. Is there an estimated time for when this will be fixed?
HL7 Staff are working on getting Confluence up as soon as they can.
Confluence is back up. Please clear cache for anything related to "confluence.hl7.org" on your browser. If you have any questions, please let me know. Thank you for your patience!

@Peter Jordan the problem was indeed due to the vulnerability you cited. As Josh says. our install has been updated now. Apologies for the disruption in service which unfortunately happened during our US Labor Day holiday.

Confluence down?
image.png
